_header: In the land of Rome I-bore was Saint Calston
Subjects: Calixtus, pope, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of Pope Calixtus, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
In þe lond of rome I bore was seint calstonto swyþe gret
                    goodnesse he drouȝ in his ȝouþe anon…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& bring vs to þe ioye þat euermore I leste&
                    þer in to wonye & maken þer oure feste
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 328-31.
